title: ICYMI - Abby Wambach on "Wolfpack" and Demanding Gender Equality On and Off the Field (Rebroadcast)
itunes:title: ICYMI - Abby Wambach on "Wolfpack" and Demanding Gender Equality On and Off the Field (Rebroadcast)
description:
Women's World Cup champion and "Wolfpack" author Abby Wambach discusses the income disparity between professional female athletes and their male counterparts. Originally aired on June 10, 2019.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
